title: A Litany of Mistakes (with Christine Jardine MP)
itunes:title: A Litany of Mistakes (with Christine Jardine MP)
description:
First Minister Nicola Sturgeon should apologize for the Scottish government's handling of the pandemic, says Christine Jardine, Liberal Democrat Treasury Spokesperson and MP for Edinburgh West. She tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts it's been a litany of mistakes.

Plus: Will supply chain disruption and soaring energy bills hit the Westminster government's support? Bloomberg Opinion Editor Therese Raphael joins with her analysis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
